pages.text: The $(major)Dragon Health Crystal/$ is part of the $(l:geneticsresequenced:genes/ender_dragon_health)Ender Dragon Health/$ Gene.$(br2)While you have that Gene, and while holding a Dragon Health Crystal, any incoming damage is negated and instead dealt to the Crystal.
A fresh Dragon Health Crystal has $(minor)1,000 durability/$.$(br2)Each half-heart deals 1 point of durability damage.$(br2)It can be repaired with End Crystals.
